captions.text:
>>YOU SHOULD TEST OUT MY LATEST INVENTION
DONATELLO.

I CALL IT TIME MACHINE.
>>SI.

>>IT ALLOWS YOU TO SEE HOW IMPORTANT YOUR
WORK IS GOING

TO BE TO FUTURE GENERATIONS.
>>NO.

>>OH MICHELANGELO.
HOW DID IT GO?

>>LEONARDO, YOU REMEMBER THE TIME I'M
EATING ALL THAT BAD EGGPLANT PARMESAN AND

IT GIVE ME THE CRAZY IDEA
TO PAINT ON THE CEILING?

>>THE SISTINE CHAPEL, SI.
>>SI, 500 YEARS LATER, PEOPLE ARE STILL ADMIRING

IT WITH THEIR HEADS LIKE THIS
AND THEIR MOUTHS

LIKE THIS.
>>MAGNIFICO!

I WANT TO GO!
>>YOU CAN GO AS SOON AS MARCO POLO GETS BACK.

>>WHO IS THIS MARCO POLO?
>>HE IS A NOBODY.

HE WENT ON ONE INSIGNIFICANT
VOYAGE AIN'T NOBODY

GOING TO REMEMBER HIM.
BUT HE GAVE ME A LOT OF MONEY SO I LET HIM

GO.
OH.

HELLO MARCO.
HOW WAS IT?

>>YOU WERE RIGHT LEONARDO.
I SEARCH AND I SEARCH, BUT FIND NOTHING I

HAVE DONE TO
BENEFIT THE FUTURE GENERATIONS.

>>NOT EVERYONE MEANT TO BE FAMOUS MARCO.
>>YES, BUT EVERYTHING CHANGE ON A HOT AFTERNOON

WHEN I GO SWIM.
I STOP BECAUSE I HEAR A CHILD'S VOICE YELL OUT
"MARCO!"

>>COULD HAVE BEEN FOR ANYBODY,
I'M SURE MARCO'S A

VERY POPULAR NAME.
>>THAT'S WHAT I THINK TOO, BUT THEN ALL

THE OTHER
KIDS IN THE POOL YELL OUT, "POLO".

>>WHAT?
HOW CAN THIS BE?

EXPLORERS LIKE YOU ARE A DIME A DOZEN.
MY MOMMA'S DISCOVERED MORE PLACES THAN YOU.

>>SO THE KID WHO SAYS THE MARCO,
HE STARTS TO SWIMMING AROUND, BUT I NOTICED

HE BLIND.
HE CANNOT SEE.

BUT WHEN HE A TOUCHES ME, HIS SIGHT IS RESTORED.
WHEN HE REALIZE HE HAS JUST TOUCHED THE REAL

MARCO POLO,
HE YELLS OUT, "STRANGER DANGER."

>>AH VELO >>YEAH,
I DON'T KNOW WHAT THIS MEAN, BUT HIS PAPA

JUMPED INTO THE
POOL AND PUNCHED ME IN THE FACE TO SHOW HIS

APPRECIATIONS.
>>MY RESEARCH ON THE HUMAN ANATOMY IS GOING

TO CHANGE MEDICINE AND SAVE THOUSANDS OF LIVES,
HOW COME NOBODY YELL OUT MY NAME AND PUNCH

MY FACE TO ME?
>>DON'T WORRY LEONARDO I'M SURE THIS WAS

JUST A COINCIDENCE.
>>OH!

THAT'S WHAT I THINK TOO!
SO I GO TO ANOTHER POOL AND ALL THE KIDS ARE

SAYING MARCO POLO.
I'VE GOT EVERY POOL I CAN FIND AND EVERYBODY

SAYING "MARCO POLO!"
>>THEY DON'T RESPECT MY WORK, THEY DON'T

DESERVE MY WORK.
YOU GUYS, YOU GUYS HAVE NO IDEA HOW

LONG THIS TAKE TO PAINT.
SHE WAS A VERY DIFFICULT SUBJECT.

>>I'M GOING TO GO PAINT GOOFY MUSTACHES
ON THE SISTINE CHAPEL.

>>CONTIGO.
>>HEY!

>>OH RAFAEL!
>>DON'T DESTROY YOUR WORK.

THEY'RE GOING TO MAKE A KID SHOW BASED ON
THE FOUR OF US!

>>THEY CHOSE OUR CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE FINE
ARTS AND

THE HEALTH PROMOTION?
>>NO, IT'S ABOUT PRE-PUBESCENT TORTOISE

NINJAS WITH A
GENETIC ALTERATIONS.

>>THAT IS AWESOME.
>>THAT'S WHAT I THINK TOO!
>>AH COWABUNGA!
